医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
911 电信设备改善了妇女在心脏骤停期间的心肺复苏 (CPR) 服务与男性相比，女性在公共场合接受心肺复苏 (CPR) 的可能性较低，但根据即将在美国心脏协会 (American Heart Association) 会议上公布的初步研究，当 911 电话通讯器向寻求心脏骤停患者帮助的呼叫者提供救生指示时，这种差异得到了改善。 2024 年复苏科学研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/911-telecommunicators-improve-CPR-access-for-women-during-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/911-telecommunicators-improve-CPR-access-for-women-during-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ef3ebf9-ddc0-4b15-8138-a4f7bdeb4e9e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:23:39 -0500 911 telecommunicators improve CPR access for women during cardiac arrest
即使没有种族修饰符，MESA 心脏病风险评分也表现良好根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上公布的一项初步研究，MESA 心脏病风险评分的一个版本与包含种族的版本一样，不包含种族预测的心脏病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MESA-heart-disease-risk-score-performs-well-even-without-race-modifiers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MESA-heart-disease-risk-score-performs-well-even-without-race-modifiers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12281410-767b-4490-bf6e-7ad3158ef16e Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:16:15 -0500 MESA heart disease risk score performs well even without race modifiers
CKM 综合征导致生命早期患心血管疾病的风险升高根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项初步研究，患有慢性肾病、2 型糖尿病或两者兼而有之的人预计比没有这些疾病的人早 8 至 28 年患心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CKM-syndrome-leads-to-elevated-cardioangio-disease-risk-earlier-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CKM-syndrome-leads-to-elevated-cardioangio-disease-risk-earlier-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b6cd137-6026-45cf-8943-e0e00ae4a495 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:10:36 -0500 CKM syndrome leads to elevated cardiovascular disease risk earlier in life
红线划线及其对心脏病和糖尿病的持久影响根据将于 2024 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项初步研究，心脏病、2 型糖尿病、高血压和肥胖症更为常见，并且与居住在以前受到红线限制的社区的人们获得健康食品的机会减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Redlined-and-its- permanent-impact-on-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Redlined-and-its- permanent-impact-on-heart-disease-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e61da974-e145-48ab-a6d8-5803b7ddad3f Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:51:00 -0500 Redlining and its lasting impact on heart disease and diabetes
CDC 更新临床医生疼痛护理指南疼痛每天影响着数百万美国人的生活，改善疼痛护理和疼痛患者的生活是公共卫生的当务之急。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CDC-updates-pain-care-guidelines-for-clinicians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/CDC-updates-pain-care-guidelines-for-clinicians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da89d997-6464-41f2-a0c2-c8909f3381cd Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:29:46 -0500 CDC updates pain care guidelines for clinicians
研究表明肝脑通讯是管理昼夜节律饮食模式和肥胖的关键这项研究揭示了肝迷走神经对昼夜食物摄入的影响，为通过有针对性的干预措施治疗肥胖提供了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-reveals-liver-brain-communication-as-key-to-managing-circadian-eating-patterns-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-reveals-liver-brain-communication-as-key-to-managing-circadian-eating-patterns-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a328736b-020d-4d36-b6cd-f5d7709c5c07 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:13:00 -0500 Study reveals liver-brain communication as key to managing circadian eating patterns and obesity
研究将肠道菌群失调与胰腺癌联系起来，为早期检测提供了途径肠道微生物群对胰腺癌的影响凸显了早期筛查和粪便微生物群移植在提高治疗效果方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Studies-link-gut-dysbiosis-to-pancreatic-cancer-offering-pathways-for-early-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Studies-link-gut-dysbiosis-to-pancreatic-cancer-offering-pathways-for-early-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1e81ac2-ab52-4f74-933d-b48cad63db36 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 05:36:00 -0500 Studies link gut dysbiosis to pancreatic cancer, offering pathways for early detection
胰腺癌早期检测和筛查方法的进展胰腺癌筛查技术的发展对于早期检测、解决提高生存率和患者护理的关键挑战至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Progress-in-early-detection-and-screening-methods-for-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Progress-in-early-detection-and-screening-methods-for-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1751dbb0-ffa6-4078-b506-5e6125ccb0ca Mon, 11 Nov 2024 04:40:00 -0500 Progress in early detection and screening methods for pancreatic cancer
研究表明，初次接种黄热病疫苗后无需加强接种研究表明，单一黄热病疫苗可提供终生免疫力，突破性感染很少见，这支持了世界卫生组织的疫苗接种指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Research-suggests-no-need-for-yellow-fever-vaccine-booster-after-initial-dose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Research-suggests-no-need-for-yellow-fever-vaccine-booster-after-initial-dose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbc7a9fb-91d1-4791-a15f-fedc5a9bc1f2 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 04:05:00 -0500 Research suggests no need for yellow fever vaccine booster after initial dose
热暴露显着增加孕产妇和新生儿健康风险研究表明，高温暴露会增加孕妇及其婴儿的健康风险，影响早产、低出生体重和高血压等结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241110/Heat-exposure-significantly-heightens-risks-for-maternal-and-newborn-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241110/Heat-exposure-significantly-heightens-risks-for-maternal-and-newborn-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd6ca725-9a88-49ff-bf7e-4abcafbcc23d Sun, 10 Nov 2024 22:14:00 -0500 Heat exposure significantly heightens risks for maternal and newborn health
